main.name: Huong Le
main.description: As a dynamic and willing to learn, my current position is Frontend/Reactjs Developer. However, in the near future I will upgrade myself and aim to become a Fullstack web developer.I want to overcome the prejudices and difficulties of girls when pursuing this field. I want to prove myself....
main.bio: Every destination needs a start and effort. As a newbie, with passion and eagerness to learn, I dream of an environment for self-development and self-improvement. My goal is simply to make myself professional, confident with my ability of Front-end fields, or Fullstack Web in near future, create products with real values. I aspire to devote my youth to the work I pursue...
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

work.title: ReactJS developer
work.description: Short-term training on processes, working/ report tools, Typescript, NextJS, NodeJS. Participate in real projects (outsource projects from Korea). Get trained and participate in the actual project testing process.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
